Line 83: Line 83:
Google also is involved in collaborative development efforts with the [[Mozilla Foundation]], based on a recent job posting.<ref>[http://www.google.com/support/jobs/bin/answer.py?answer=29553 Google Job Listing for Software Engineer, Firefox - Mountain View].</ref> Google is looking for software engineers to join them in collaborative development on the [[Firefox]] browser. They also offer a download of Firefox with the [[List of Google services and tools#Toolbar|Google Toolbar]] pre-installed.
Google also is involved in collaborative development efforts with the [[Mozilla Foundation]], based on a recent job posting.<ref>[http://www.google.com/support/jobs/bin/answer.py?answer=29553 Google Job Listing for Software Engineer, Firefox - Mountain View].</ref> Google is looking for software engineers to join them in collaborative development on the [[Firefox]] browser. They also offer a download of Firefox with the [[List of Google services and tools#Toolbar|Google Toolbar]] pre-installed.

==Controversies==
  â
===Google China===
  â
Google has recently set up an altered version of their search engine for China known as "Google China" (Google.cn). As requested by the Chinese government, Google China prevents Chinese citizens from searching for words or topics that the Chinese government wants prohibited. The differences are apparent in the search results for "Tiananmen Square Massacre" on
  â
[http://images.google.com/images?svnum=10&hl=en&lr=&q=Tiananmen+Square+massacre&btnG=Search Google.com] compared to [http://images.google.cn/images?svnum=10&hl=zh-CN&lr=&q=Tiananmen+Square+massacre&btnG=%E6%90%9C%E7%B4%A2 Google China].
